title: Diamond Bangles - The Sparkling Kadayam
materials: these bangles are adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds. Each stone is selected for its exceptional clarity (VS1-VS2) and color (G-H). The gold has a rich
features: These Kadayam bangles feature a modern, streamlined design accented by intricately set diamond clusters in a square motif. The wavy gold pattern connecting the diamond accents adds a touch of contemporary elegance. The secure, hidden clasp ensures a comfortable and seamless fit.
colors: The warm yellow gold beautifully complements the brilliant white of the diamonds
creating a timeless and sophisticated contrast.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (pellillu)
and festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi. Their modern design also makes them suitable for sophisticated evening events.
description: These bangles are a stunning blend of classic beauty and modern design, crafted with the highest quality materials and exceptional attention to detail. The sparkling diamonds add a touch of luxury and make these bangles a valuable investment piece that can be cherished for generations. Their lightweight design ensures comfortable wear all day long.
